import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import MedicineSearch from "../components/MedicineSearch"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CategorySection from "../components/CategorySection"; import CategoryNavbar from "../components/CategoryNavbar"; import PersonalCare from "../components/personalcare/PersonalCare"; import api from "../api/axios"; import "bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min"; import "bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css"; // Make sure to import your new CSS file import './home.css'; // ⭐️ Import the new CSS function Home() { const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const [query, setQuery] = useState(""); const [suggestions, setSuggestions] = useState([]); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("Medicines"); const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user")); // ✅ Scroll effect useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => setScrolled(window.scrollY > 150); window.addEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener("scroll", handleScroll); }, []); // ✅ Search Suggestions useEffect(() => { const fetchSuggestions = async () => { if (query.trim().length < 2) return setSuggestions([]); try { const res = await api.get("/medicines/search", { params: { q: query } }); setSuggestions(res.data); } catch (err) { console.error("Search error:", err.message); } }; const debounce = setTimeout(fetchSuggestions, 300); return () => clearTimeout(debounce); }, [query]); const renderCategorySection = () => { switch (selectedCategory) { case "Personal Care": return ; default: return ; } }; return (
{/* ⭐️ HERO CAROUSEL CONTAINER - Added 'hero-container' class */}
{/* ⭐️ OVERLAY SEARCH BAR - Updated text for professionalism */}

Your Health, Delivered.

Search, consult, and order medicines from **MediQ**, Kerala's trusted digital pharmacy.

{/* ✅ SEARCH RESULTS */} {suggestions.length > 0 && (
Showing results for: {query}
{suggestions.map((med) => (
{med.name}

Category: {med.category}

Symptoms: {med.symptoms?.join(", ")}

{med.description}

Price: ₹{med.price}

))}
)} {/* ✅ CATEGORY NAVBAR */} {/* ✅ DYNAMIC CATEGORY SECTION */} {renderCategorySection()} {/* ⭐️ FEATURES - Changed to container-fluid for full width */}

🔎 Search Medicines

Find medicines by name, category, or symptoms easily.

📤 Upload Prescription

Upload doctor’s prescription for pharmacist approval.

🛒 Easy Orders

Buy approved medicines in one click or select only what you need.

{/* ✅ QUICK LINKS */}
Browse Medicines {user?.role !== "pharmacist" && ( <> Upload Prescription View Orders 👤 My Profile )} {user?.role === "pharmacist" && ( Pharmacist Dashboard )}
{/* ✅ ABOUT SECTION */} {/* ⭐️ FOOTER SECTION - Using the new updated component */}
); } // ✅ Carousel Styling function carouselStyle(imageUrl) { return { backgroundImage: `url('${imageUrl}')`, backgroundSize: "cover", backgroundPosition: "center", height: "70vh", }; } // ⭐️ About Section - Changed to container-fluid for full width function AboutSection() { return (

Stay Healthy with MediQ: Kerala's Trusted Online Pharmacy and Healthcare Platform

We Bring Care Closer

MediQ is built on a mission to simplify healthcare for every Indian household. With over{" "} 31 million orders delivered across 1800+ cities, we’ve become a trusted name in digital pharmacy.

Medicines at Your Doorstep

With a catalog of over 2 lakh medicines and health essentials, MediQ offers everything from life-saving prescriptions to daily wellness items.

Ayurveda for Everyday Wellness

At MediQ, we honor India’s rich tradition of holistic healing by offering a dedicated Ayurveda section.

The Pharmacist at Your Fingertips

Our certified pharmacists are available online to validate prescriptions, ensure safety, and provide dosage guidance — making MediQ your reliable healthcare companion.

Stay Healthy!
